mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_task (title, remark, end_time, reminder_time, completed, priority, create_time, update_time, deleted) VALUES (#{title}, #{remark}, #{endTime}, #{reminderTime}, #{completed}, #{priority}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{deleted})
mapper.delete: UPDATE tb_task SET deleted = 1 WHERE task_id = #{taskId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_task WHERE task_id IN ( SELECT task_id FROM tb_list_task WHERE list_id = #{listId}) AND deleted = 0
